amendatorysection.catchline: Containers of hog cholera serum, vaccine, virus; label; contents.
amendatorysection.para: Each container of hog cholera serum, vaccine, and virus shall have thereon a label showing the name of the manufacturer, the name of the contents, the date on which its potency is regarded as uncertain, the United States veterinary license number under which such product is manufactured and tested, and the doses and procedural recommendations of the manufacturer as being protective for swine of various weights.
